handleAllExceptions(Exception, WebRequest) - Method in class by.rozmysl.booking.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
This method will catch exceptions not caught by previous handlers
handleEntityNotFoundEx(MyEntityNotFoundException, WebRequest) - Method in class by.rozmysl.booking.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
The method defines the handler responsible for exceptions: MyEntityNotFoundException, EntityNotFoundException, MessagingException, FileNotFoundException, IOException, AuthenticationException
handleHttpMessageNotReadable(HttpMessageNotReadableException, HttpHeaders, HttpStatus, WebRequest) - Method in class by.rozmysl.booking.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
The method overrides the handler responsible for HttpMessageNotReadableException
handleMethodArgumentNotValid(MethodArgumentNotValidException, HttpHeaders, HttpStatus, WebRequest) - Method in class by.rozmysl.booking.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
The method overrides the handler responsible for MethodArgumentNotValid
handleMethodArgumentTypeMismatch(MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException, WebRequest) - Method in class by.rozmysl.booking.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
The method defines the handler responsible for exceptions: InvocationTargetException, IllegalArgumentException, ClassCastException, MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException, ConversionFailedException
handleNoHandlerFoundException(NoHandlerFoundException, HttpHeaders, HttpStatus, WebRequest) - Method in class by.rozmysl.booking.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
The method overrides the handler responsible for NoHandlerFoundException
host - Variable in class by.rozmysl.booking.config.MailConfig
